title: Please... for the love of god people start using curse.

embed.description: Bring your friends, teammates, and games together with Curse Voice The next generation in gaming communication is here. Curse Voice brings together your favorite games, friends, and teammates with world-class technology to provide you with an epic communication experience. At Curse, we are passionate about gaming and we know that exceptional communication with your teammates is critical for your success.

body:
It seriously is so much better than skype/teamspeak/any other voice program.
I do not see people using it ever.
You can connect it to your steam, league, and skype so you can find your friends on curse easily.
Plus it has a league overlay and it is approved by league.

Am I just a person never seeing people use it?

replies.body: If I want to communicate with my allies I attach a scroll to my raven then fly it to their house
Already get flamed enough over the in-game chat.  Why would I want to listen to kiddies do over the mic?
I am not only aware of this program, but also do not ever use voice chat for League. I do not want to meet people from League.

I use it with friends, though we mostly use skype, we do NOT however invite random Q people to the call. In ranked I play solo almost exclusively, but my thing is what people TYPE is generally more filtered than what they yell, I do not want to listen to jimmy with 2 y's bitch and moan and rage. There are people who curse makes their LoL lag, people who just outright don't like it
I used to use it... but then my friend got a mac...
But they don't have a Mac version :( <\3
I use it. I made my ranked fives team all get it.

I think you're the only one. When I get invited, my "friends" 7/10 times will set up a curse.

I just never use it because I'm shy as hell.

no
I have curse but I don't use it for the same reason I play soloq
FUCK TALKING TO OTHER PEOPLE....i've got too much spaghetti in my pockets to do that.
